One of the best first person shooters I've played. Really loved the weapons system and gamemodes.

An update on the old classic. And I tend to like it better than 1.6 or Source. It's free now, so why not try it out? Be careful because it'll suck your time away.

It's a good, skill based game, but very frustrating for the serious player. The player base can be very toxic, AFKers and spinners disrupting the game/a player's progression through the ranks.
